headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){

}else {
  tag()

</js>

let replaceCover = (u) => {
    if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
    else u = u.substring(7)
    let uArr = u.split("/")
    uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
    let uArr2 = []
    uArr.forEach((x) => {
        if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
        else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
    })
    u = uArr2.join("/")
    return u
}
replaceCover(java.getString("thumb_url"))
</js>

<js>
//AESè§£å¯†
function De(data, key, iv) {
	aes = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
	return aes.decrypt(data)
}
//AESåŠ å¯†
function En(data, key, iv) {
	aes = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
	return aes.encrypt(data)
}
function rHex(num) {
	hex = Number(num).toString(16).padStart(32, "0")
	res = ""
	for (i = hex.length; i > 0; i -= 2) {
		res += hex.substring(i - 2, i)
	}
	return res
}
//è·å–key
function getKey() {
	key = b64De("rCXGfd2POMGzeiNIgo4iLg==")
	id = java.strToBytes(java.randomUUID().slice(0,16))
	did = baseUrl.match(/device_id=(\d+)/)[1]
	data = java.hexDecodeToByteArray(rHex(did))
	content = b64En(id.concat(En(data, key, id)))
	data = JSON.stringify({
		"content": content
	})
	url = xGorgon("https://reading.snssdk.com/reading/crypt/registerkey?"+source.getLoginHeader(), gzip(data))
	uri = String(url).split(",{")
	url = uri[0]
	option = JSON.parse("{"+uri[1])
	obj = post(url, b64De(option.body), option.headers).data
	res = b64De(obj.key)
	iv = res.slice(0, 16)
	data = res.slice(16)
	key = b64En(De(data, key, iv))
	java.log(key)
	obj = {
		"key": key,
		"ver": obj.keyver
	}
	source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(obj, "", "\t"))
}
//æ­£æ–‡
result = JSON.parse(result).data

//java.log(baseUrl)

	getKey()
	result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(baseUrl)).data
}
// java.log(JSON.stringify(result, "", "  "))
ver = result.key_version
v = source.getVariable()
if (v == "" || ver != JSON.parse(v).ver) getKey()
key = JSON.parse(source.getVariable()).key
res = b64De(result.content)
key = b64De(key)
iv = res.slice(0, 16)
java.bytesToStr(De(res.slice(16), key, iv))
</js>

        load: function(a) {         
            a = String(java.base64Decode(a)).split(/[A-Z]+%/);      
            var b = 0,
            start = 0;
            for (var i = 0; i < this.body.length; i++) {
                if (String(this.body[i]).match(/h2/i)) {
                    start = i + 1
                };

                    break
                }
            };
          
            for (var i = 0; i < a.length; i++) {
                if (a[i] < 5) {
                    this.childNode[a[i]] = this.body[i + start];
                      b++
                } else {
                    this.childNode[a[i] - b] = this.body[i + start]                 
                }
            };
  }
}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};
